titleStmt.title: A note of such arts and mysteries as an English gentleman, a souldier, and a traveller is able by Gods assistance to perform (he having means to perfect the same.)
titleStmt.author: Bulmer, John, Captain.
Sarson, Laurence, fl. 1643-1645.
Cudworth, Ralph, 1617-1688.
Dillingham, William, 1617?-1689.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: By Captain John Bulmer Engineer.
With: 'A true copy of a certificate from Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge 1646.', signed by Lawrence Sarson, Ralph Cudworth, and William Dillingham; and a poem 'To the states of England'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
